posts.title: Build a blog with HEXO and GitHub Page
posts.text: Why am I doing this?Recent years, wordpress has been changed so much that it does not look like a blogging CMS anymore. Hence, I was looking for alternative that can replace wordpress in blogging feature. After two days googling, I decided to use HEXO + GitHub Page to build my personal blog. Why HEXOI have compared HEXO, Hugo, Jekyll and some other static site generators. Here are some reasons why I choose HEXO. Easy to setup Easy to deploy Quite fast (Not as fast as Hugo but fast enough for me) Free hosting on GitHub Page / Netlify

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
